you
[Music]
hi and welcome you're listening to the
x22 report my name is Dave in this
episode 1597 a.n today's date is June
21st 2018 and the tot of the episode is
it's all starting to happen at the same
time beware the crash is coming let's
get into the economic collapse financial
news now we know that retail isn't doing
well and we have a separation which is
kind of strange in itself we have the
online retailers and the
brick-and-mortar retailers now some of
the brick-and-mortar retailers they have
an online presence and many online
retailers they don't really have a
brick-and-mortar presence so we have
this kind of separation here and
throughout the online history where you
purchase your goods online if you are
out of state you didn't have to pay
attacks now the US Supreme Court ruled
that the states may require out-of-state
online retailers to collect sales tax on
merchandise they sell in that state now
there was a ruling in 1992 and it was
quill corp vers North Dakota and they
block States from compelling retailers
with no physical presence in that state
to collect sales tax now what has
happened here is that the Government
Accountability Office estimated the
state and local governments could have
collected between 8 billion and 13
billion in sales taxes in 2017 if states
were given authority to require sales
tax collection from all remote sellers
in today's ruling authored by Justice
Anthony Kennedy the court sided with
South Dakota which had passed a law in
2016 that required large out-of-state
online retailers to collect sales tax on
merchandise sold in that state online
furniture retailer Wayfair along with
overstock.com and online electronics
retailer Newegg sued to block the law
and won in lower court and the battle
may not entirely be over
the law could face legal challenges on
other grounds and what we're seeing
right now is that these 45 states well
at first they have to come up with their
own laws to push sales tax and I don't
think that will take very long but I
think what's going to happen is if this
goes through and everyone starts
charging sales tax this is going to hurt
the online retailers I don't believe
people are gonna go hey you know
something I'm not gonna purchase online
because it's the same sales tax in the
store so I'm just gonna go to the
brick-and-mortar stores I think what's
going to happen just like the tax on
soda and I think out in other countries
where there were taxes on retail I think
in Japan
all of a sudden sales plummeted I think
the same thing is going to happen right
now because we are on the edge where
people no longer are making the amount
of money where they can just go out and
spend the money and just say hey I don't
really care
they are very cautious and what they
spend on this is why we see the
brick-and-mortar and online or retail
not doing that well and I think this is
just going to hurt it yes I know the
dollar signs look great and they can
collect a lot of tax they saw this when
they tax soda and other things but guess
what happens people say you know
something then I really don't need it
I'm not gonna buy it at all then and I
believe this will happen because what
we're seeing in this economy is that
it's completely falling apart very very
quickly everything is happening
at the same time right now and all these
other things added on top of it is not
going to help I mean look at the housing
market we've been talking about the
housing market it is a complete disaster
right now
US homes are least affordable since 2008
right now
Adham Data Solutions released its second
quarter 2018 housing affordability
report show is that people just don't
have the funds to go out and pay for
these expensive homes even though that
the pace of home prices has slowed and
it's been dropping in some areas there's
also been an 11% increase in mortgage
rates compared with a year ago
when we start to look at this and we
start to see what's going on here we're
starting to see that retail breaking
down real estate breaking down auto
sales breaking down mortgage rates
interest rates are moving up and the GDP
numbers are completely fake phony and
false because 70 percent of the GDP
numbers are individuals purchasing in
retail so if brick-and-mortar stores are
closing and online sales are not getting
the 1 to 1 ratio there is a problem here
and when we look back here at real
estate nationwide an average wage earner
would need to spend around 30 1.2
percent of their income to buy a medium
priced home in the second quarter of
2018 that's above the historic average
of 29.6% somebody earning the average
wage wouldn't qualify to buy a median
price home in 326 roughly 75% of the 432
county's analyzed in this report so the
situation is not good right now the
situation is getting worse every single
day and this summer is going to be
absolutely awful in real estate compared
to what happened last year and the year
before that what we're seeing is a
decline in people going out and
purchasing homes this is going to have
an effect on other industries lumber
plumbing electrical home furnishings you
name it it's all tied together and again
if the banks aren't loaning money
they're not making money so this is
going to be a huge huge problem we see
the Philly Fed it is crashed right now
and when we look at this we can see it
it's plunged from thirty four point four
to nineteen point no nineteen point nine
well below expectations of twenty nine I
mean this is just unbelievable right now
and this is the biggest drop in the
survey since February of 2014 and now
it's the weakest since November of 2016
new orders also collapsed I mean this is
just absolutely awful and now since this
we see the dollar is now plunging
everything is happening all at the same
time now countries they realize that
this system cannot last much longer and
they've been preparing for a very long
time we talked about Russia before how
they were selling their Treasury
securities and they're saying that they
need to do this to protect the reserves
basically what they've been doing is
they've been selling the Treasuries and
buying gold and I'm not talking about
paper gold paper contracts I'm talking
about physical gold
so Russia sold more than any other major
foreign holder of US debt so Russia's
gold holdings have been steadily
increasing bringing its share of the
precious metal to its highest level in
nearly two decades last month
Russia's gold holdings grew by one
percent to 62 million troy ounces worth
eighty point five billion now China
could do the same thing if the trade war
gets really bad and we see tariffs are
being implemented
China's fighting back and this is all
part of the plan they can do the same
thing dump the Treasuries use that to
purchase gold and basically what these
countries are doing they're getting out
of US debt why are they doing this
because they know once everything starts
to go south the paper that they're
holding is going to be worth absolutely
nothing and we see at this point while
they do this they're getting out of all
US paper which means if there are
sanctions placed on them it doesn't hurt
them because they can use other
currencies they're not holding that
paper debt they're not holding any
anything like that and they can trade in
gold they can trade in the ruble in the
yuan or any other currency bypassing the
sanctions completely so what we see
happening right now is that countries
are preparing they're getting ready and
they've been doing this for quite a
while this is not something
started yesterday they knew way back
that there were problems is why China
Russia and many other nations have been
either purchasing gold or repatriating
their gold because they're getting
prepared for what is coming we also
understand that all these economic
statistics that are being thrown out
there most of them are manipulated and I
have to refer back to 2008
one of the main statistics back then was
how the triple how the subprime
securities were triple-a that was a fake
rating and they kept using that over and
over and over saying that you know
housing can't go down the stock market
can't crash it's impossible it will
never happen and what we saw happen is
that everything fell apart all at once
even though unemployment was at one of
its lowest points the stock market was
at its highest point and the GDP numbers
look good everything looked great people
were going about their business
until one day everyone woke up and
everything started to fall apart and all
of a sudden the stock market fell apart
almost like the market has been coming
down right now in the past couple of
days the market has been dropping
actually we haven't hit any new highs in
a very long time and the market
continually comes down now what's going
to happen eventually is there's going to
be panic selling and no matter what
computer algorithm is set they will not
be able to handle the amount of selling
that people are going to do once that
happens we're going to see the same
thing that happened back in 2008
companies are going to get on board
because we know companies aren't really
making money they're basically buying
back their stock they're laying off
individuals restructuring trying to keep
the company together actually we saw
this happen prior to 2008 and when
everything starts to fall apart
this gives the corporation's an excuse
to say hey you know something we can lay
off tens of thousands of people we can
cut our costs because we need to because
the market has come down and look how
much we've lost and again this is
what they're planning on they understand
that this is going to happen this is not
something that's just gonna come out of
left field and Surprise them they've
been preparing for this they thought
this was going to happen in a different
way but they know that this is coming
the insiders know it all this is why
they pump up the bubbles they get out
before the puddles pop they sell off to
the everyday person and these people are
holding all these investments and they
think that this is going to continually
move up and up and up and up and
eventually what happens is everything
starts to fall apart and these
individuals they try to sell off they
say oh we don't want to hold on to this
because it's continually dropping every
single day and basically the drop picks
up speed and accelerates and before you
know it they're worth nothing and it
wipes a lot of people out then what
happens well then the central bankers
these same people they come in and they
buy the same exact things for pennies on
the dollar this is what they do time and
time again the insiders know what's
going on and they know this time around
this is going to be huge and they know
they need to get out of the stock market
out of housing and this is why you see
the insiders selling off this is why you
see hedge funds investment companies
trying to sell off actually they've been
selling off prior to this bubble hitting
this high point they've been selling
their investments getting out taking
profit reinvesting it someplace else a
lot have been purchasing gold and silver
some have been storing this in
cryptocurrency and we know that the
elite the insiders they know exactly
what's going on and what is happening
right now is that everything is falling
apart at the same exact time and they
know a crash is inevitable there's no
way around this we're gonna go through
some type of crash this whole entire
system has been built up on one
gigantic illusion all the way from the
manipulated unemployment numbers to the
manipulated stock market to the
manipulation everywhere else the whole
thing is an illusion and of course
what's going to happen once everything
falls apart then you'll hear stories of
how these numbers were manipulated what
they did to manipulate it I mean think
about it
in 2008 prior to 2008 you weren't
hearing that the subprime securities
were manipulated that the ratings were
manipulated and it's really not triple-a
you didn't hear any of that after the
crash what did you hear ah the rating
agencies manipulated and they gave false
ratings to these subprime securities you
always find out all of this when
everything crashes before the crash they
tell you everything is great
but they know behind the scenes it is
not so they're doing the same thing so
beware of this next crash listen
everyone
thanks a lot for listening be well be
safe and especially be prepared thanks a
lot
